item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>I agree, Matthew. I read a comparison of the England rugby team to the arrogant English army during the Colonial period of English history - I think that the journalist may well have been an Aussie!</p>
item.content:encoded: I agree, Matthew. I read a comparison of the England rugby team to the arrogant English army during the Colonial period of English history – I think that the journalist may well have been an Aussie!
